plugin.name: Copy_Info
plugin.description:
This plugin allows you to copy the details of an item:
  • Title
  • TCM ID
  • WebDav Path
  • Published URL

    • Once installed simply right-click an item within the CMS and use the menu entry Copy Info.

    If you have flash installed the information is placed directly on your clipboard, if not a small dialog will appear to allow you to manually copy and paste the content.
